'''Story Quests''' are stories revolving around [[Playable Characters]] and their interactions with the [[Traveler]]. Story Quest Chapters are named after the character's [[Constellations/Gallery|constellation]].

Most Story Quests give the opportunity to trial the character briefly, if the character was already acquired and is currently being used, then the player's version will be replaced by the trial version.

==How to Unlock==
All Story Quests have requirements that the player has to meet to unlock the quest. These requirements may differ between each act of the story chapter. Requirements include:
*Reaching the required [[File:Item Adventure EXP.png|20px]] [[Adventure Rank]].
*Completing prior quests in the chapter.
*Completing [[Archon Quest]] acts.
*Completing other Characters' Story Quests.
*Using the required number of Story Keys.

==Story Keys==
{{Main|Story Key}}
[[File:Item Story Key.png|thumb|right|Story Key]]
'''Story Keys''' are quest unlock items that players after Adventure Rank 26 can claim every 8 [[Commissions]] completed (i.e. 2 days of 4 Commissions). Story Keys will not be earned automatically and must be claimed from the Story Quests menu once eligible. A total of 3 Story Keys can be held at one time, but the counter will still continue to max out at 8, so one is able to immediately be claimed after one has been spent.
*Story Quest Acts available before Adventure Rank 32 do not require Story Keys.
*Story Quest Acts available after Adventure Rank 32 require 1 Story Key.
*Hangout Event Acts require 2 Story Keys and repeating the same Hangout will not require more.
